hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select t.uuid as uuid, t.create_time as create_time, t.creator as creator, t.modifier as modifier, t.modify_time as modify_time, t.rec_ver as rec_ver, t.student_name as name, t.student_age as age, t.student_sex as sex
from uf_uf_dms_eg_student t
where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(keyword)> and (t.name like '%' || :keyword || '%' ) </if> <if isNotBlank(whereSql)> and ${whereSql} </if> <if isNotBlank(orderBy)> ${orderBy} </if>
